intro.description: I'm a software developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional web experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating modern web applications. With several years of experience in software development, I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly websites and applications.
about.background: My journey in software development began with a strong foundation in computer science, and I've since worked on various projects ranging from small business websites to complex enterprise applications. I'm constantly learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.intro: I work with a variety of technologies and tools across the full stack. Here are some of my key areas of expertise:

interests.title: Beyond Coding
interests.description: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and sharing knowledge with the developer community. I'm also passionate about user experience design and creating intuitive interfaces that make technology more accessible to everyone.
